name: Arm Sling
description: Triangular bandage arm sling for arm injuries
warning: For arm and shoulder injuries. Do not move arm if fracture is suspected.
emergency_notes: Support the injured arm before applying sling

steps.title: Requirements
steps.description: "You need a triangular bandage for this. You can also use cloth, clothes, or handkerchief as long as it is clean. Just cut or fold the alternative just like the triangular bandage. Refer to the Narrow Cravat protocol if not yet familiar.
steps.voice_prompt: Prepare a triangular bandage or a clean cloth alternative.

steps.title: Secure the Injured Arm
steps.description: You need to ask the patient or other people to support the injured arm.
steps.voice_prompt: Ask the patient or someone nearby to support the injured arm.

steps.title: Slide Under the Arm
steps.description: Slide one edge of the bandage under the arm up until to the patient's shoulder.
steps.voice_prompt: Slide one edge of the bandage under the injured arm up to the shoulder.

steps.title: Cross the Bandage
steps.description: Put the other side of the bandage to the other shoulder.
steps.voice_prompt: Bring the other side of the bandage over to the opposite shoulder.

steps.title: Secure the Arm
steps.description: Don't pull the bandage quickly. Do it slowly while asking the patient if they are comfortable.
steps.voice_prompt: Pull the bandage slowly and gently. Ask the patient if they are comfortable.
steps.critical_warning: Tip: Always move slowly and check with the patient to avoid causing additional pain

steps.title: Let Go of the Support
steps.description: After securing the injured arm, you may now ask them to let go of the support.
steps.voice_prompt: Once the arm is secure, ask them to release the support.

steps.title: Tie the Bandage
steps.description: With the use of square knots, the bandage is secured and easy to untangle.
steps.voice_prompt: Tie the bandage using a square knot. It is secure yet easy to untangle.
steps.critical_warning: Tip: To perform a square knot, hold the ends with each hand, put the right end over the left and tie, then put the left end over the right and tie

steps.title: Clean Up
steps.description: To make it more secure, fold the edges and adjust other edges by folding and tucking it in.
steps.voice_prompt: Fold and tuck in the edges to secure the sling.
steps.critical_warning: Tip: Check circulation in the fingertips every 10 minutes
